parameters.name: startLat

parameters.name: startLng
parameters.description: Filter routes starting near this longitude

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of popular routes to return (default: 10)

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Start date for route analysis (ISO format)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: End date for route analysis (ISO format)

parameters.description: Timeframe for analysis: daily, weekly, monthly (default: weekly)
